Rule.Description: Route OMADMPRC.EXE
Authorize OMADMPRC.EXE be loadable to $(SYSTEM_USER_NAME) and chambers
Only TCB can launch into this chamber
Route OMADMCLIENT.EXE
Authorize OMADMCLIENT.EXE be loadable to $(SYSTEM_USER_NAME) and $(SYSTEM_IDENTITY_GROUP_NAME) chambers
Only System authorized to execute ColdInit.exe
Only System authorized to execute CIPhase2.exe
Protect ColdInit registry keys. Only System can write to them, but normal+ can read them
Allow access to events coldinit phase2 done event (excluding guid_ui.exe). Only System can write to them, but normal+ can read them
Allow access to events coldinit phase2 completion event (including guid_ui.exe). Only System can write to them, but normal+ can read them
Route COLDINIT.EXE
Authorize COLDINIT.EXE be loadable to $(SYSTEM_USER_NAME) and chambers
Route CIPHASE2.EXE
Authorize CIPHASE2.EXE be loadable to $(SYSTEM_USER_NAME) and chambers
Only TCB can launch into this chamber
Only TCB Chamber can call PushRouter_SubmitPush API
Everyone can call PushRouter_RegisterClient API
Everyone can call PushRouter_UnRegisterClient API
Everyone can call PushRouter_Open API
Everyone can call PushRouter_Close API
Everyone can call PushRouter_GetMessage API
Only TCB gets all access to the Push Router directory
